Include dependency graph for Win32/adf_nativ.c:

Detailed Description

Win32 specific drive-access routines for ADFLib.

Modified for Win32 by Dan Sutherland <dan@chromerhino.demon.co.uk>

Modified 29/8/00 by Gary Harris.

  • Added a third, Boolean argument to Win32InitDevice() to avoid a compilation warning caused by the mismatch with the number of arguments in ADFLib's adfInitDevice().
Typical Usage
See api_native.html for an example of typical usage of the native functions and how to add platform support to ADFLib.
